pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo nibbiṭṭharājabhaṭo “taññeva bhaṭapathaṃ yācissāmī”ti sīsaṃ nahāyitvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ nissāya rājakulaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.3: Aññatarā bhikkhunī kaṭāhe vaccaṃ katvā tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentī tassa brāhmaṇassa matthake āsumbhi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.9: Aññataro upāsako upassayā nikkhamanto addasa taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ummukaṃ gahetvā upassayaṃ pavisantaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.11: “kissa tvaṃ, bho, ummukaṃ gahetvā upassayaṃ pavisasī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.12: “Imā maṃ, bho, muṇḍā bandhakiniyo gūthakaṭāhaṃ matthake āsumbhiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.16: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo sīsaṃ nahāyitvā rājakulaṃ gantvā sahassaṃ alattha tañca bhaṭapathaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.17: Atha kho so upāsako upassayaṃ pavisitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocetvā paribhāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.18: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.20: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.23: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:1.26: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:2.1.12: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc8:2.1.25: Sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
